name: mpv-player
description: MPV Player built with Electron, Vue and TypeScript

scripts.package: npm run build && npm run build:native && electron-builder
scripts.package:mac: npm run build && npm run build:native && electron-builder --mac
scripts.dist: npm run build && npm run build:native && electron-builder --mac --arm64
